tags: me? making a side blog to talk about skam? its more likely than you think
summary: listen i understand why you don’t want lucas to say homophobic slurs but it could be interesting to see how the show would...
body: listen i understand why you don’t want lucas to say homophobic slurs but it could be interesting to see how the show would handle it, because let me tell you that it is a huge problem in france. homophobic slurs have been so normalized here. there is this one slur (the equivalent of f*ggot) that ppl, especially men, use all the damn time. instead of calling someone an asshole, whenever they’re mad at someone or they’re just between friends, they use it, thinking it’s meaningless. skam france could definitely tackle this issue during the season and a scene between lucas and mika would be the best way to do it. lucas randomly saying that slur, mika being like “wait what did you say” and lucas answering that it’s no big deal, everybody says that THEN mika would educate him and open his eyes on his internalized homophobia, the same way eskild did with isak

summary:
me: (◡‿◡✿) take a deep breath and let's not think about SKAM France for a while as I focus on bio; breatheeee...
me to me: BUT...
body:
me: (◡‿◡✿) take a deep breath and let’s not think about SKAM France for a while as I focus on bio; breatheeee…

me to me: BUT ARE WE SEEING ELIOTT TMRW? HOW CAN I NOT FREAK OUT ABT ARTHUR?? WHERE’S THE BULLYING GOING TO COME FROM??? WHAT’S LUCAS GOING TO DO???? WHAT IF—

me: (ʘ‿ʘ✿)

summary: What if in the storyline of bullying Lucas is not the victim but the bully? I’m scared
question: What if in the storyline of bullying Lucas is not the victim but the bully? I’m scared
answer:
i really don’t think so anon, don’t worry too much about it. it’d be totally out of character for lucas in my opinion, also the articles that mentioned bullying strongly implied he was the one getting hateful and ignorant comments, not the other way around (AND THIS IS NOT A GOOD THING EITHER)

i hope think the worst we can get about homophobic lucas is him making a comment like Isak with the dance teacher in the og. and to me, the focus of him trying to be a straight dudebro is going to be about him overly talking about girls à la basile

tags: it takes time to be like: move im gay
summary: The road to self-acceptance is not linear
body:
The road to self-acceptance is not linear

People are confused as to why Lucas lied on the test and then looked up how to hide being gay after going after Eliott last Friday. They’ve questioned this “ooc” behaviour as a “backtrack”.

The answer: it’s not a backtrack. Accepting yourself in any way, shape or form is difficult. Not to mention terrifying. There’s no simple A to B point.

Lucas, just like Isak & Marti, knows who he is, but he’s afraid, as they were. As most of us lgbt+ people have been, or still are. It’s scary facing the world with a ‘new’ identity. It’s scary shedding away your layers when they’ve all you’ve been relying on. It’s scary baring yourself to the world and saying “this is who I am”. It’s as terrifying as it is liberating.

It takes time. We know it will be worth it in the end

summary: holly shit, that comment on the forum was harsh :( i don't see Luca following that advice or if he does he will make it less...
question: holly shit, that comment on the forum was harsh :( i don't see Luca following that advice or if he does he will make it less mean i guess? but idk, it wouldn't make sense after what Alexia said, because it obviously made an impact on Lucas. Fuck. Tahnk you so much for translating hon :)
answer:
it was awful i felt so bad????

i think lucas is indeed going to get real “heavy” with talking about girls, and it will sound super forced and cringy probably (so yayyy)

but i really can’t see him making an homophobic comment?? i know that’s not a really valid point but the way he acted with alexia gave me a different vibe, he was open to talk about the fact she’s bi and not too uneasy or overly defensive.

but if it has to happen, maybe it’d make more sense if it was before eliott gives him his scarf back? because i saw someone point out that if lucas had taken that test last friday, before seeing eliott with his gf, he would’ve been way more confident, and that the fact he’s thinking he imagined things about the way eliott was feeling about him got him to crawl back deeper into the closet. eliott going to see him on tomorrow could either be a new confidence boost for lucas, or in the contrary confuse him even more???

idk if I make any sort of sense? i’m sick, emotionally drained and confused so try to forgive me

(also you’re welcome for the translation! 💕)

blog.name: florenzisdavid
blog.title: livet er nå
blog.description:
obsessed with skam and it’s remakes (mostly druck)

laila | 15 | queer | switzerland

summary: hiii can u write smth w elliott being an artist? French raccoon pls? I'm a hoe for that
question: hiii can u write smth w elliott being an artist? French raccoon pls? I'm a hoe for that
answer:
of course i can it’s not exactly what you asked for i just went witj the flow hope you like it anyway! this is my first fic i‘m publishing here so i‘m kinda nervous haha enjoy

—-

Draw me like one of your French girls

When Eliott woke up he felt a something warm on his chest snuggling against him. He opened his eyes and saw Lucas sleeping on him with his hair going into every direction. He looked so beautiful like this, just so peaceful like he didn’t have any worries. Eliott almost gave into the instinct to get up and draw him. But then he would have to move away from him. And that he just physically couldn’t do.

He let out a sigh and moved his eyes over Lucas’ face again. To his slightly parted lips. They made Eliott think of last night. These lips touched his own. The memories came back and he started smiling like an idiot. He still couldn’t believe Lucas, the most wonderful boy he’s ever known, left Chloé without a thought and actually let Eliott kiss him. He wonders where he got the courage from.

But now thinking about it. Lucas was like a magnet. Trying to pull him close with such a force. He tried to resist it first, but when he looked into Lucas’ eyes yesterday. There was something. The way he looked at him like he really knew him. At that moment Eliott knew it was hopeless to resist any longer. He had already fallen hard for this boy.

Eliott’s thoughts were interrupted by Lucas slowly moving away. He looked down and saw those beautiful blue eyes, he had just been thinking about, looking right at him. “Bonjour” Lucas said with a sleepy voice that was more than enough to make Eliott pull him back into him. Lucas started giggling at that but moved his arm around him to hold the older boy.

“Do you want to get breakfast?” Eliott asked. Lucas answered with a simple “No.”

“Okay.” They were lying there in comfortable silence for a while until Lucas moved his chin up not being able to resist any longer and kissed him. Eliott melted into the kiss. Never could he get enough of kissing Lucas, kissing his soft lips. Felling his small body against his own. Lucas’ hands in his hair. It was magic. And now what he was dreaming about since he first bumped into him was actually happening. He couldn’t believe his luck.

Lucas pulled away slowly and asked him with a soft voice “Did you sleep well?” “Better than ever” Eliott replied “But I have to say it was a little chelou having someone drooling on my chest” he added teasingly. Lucas hit him his arm playfully “Heyyyy I did not do that.” But he was smiling.

“Yes, you did. But it doesn’t matter because you looked beautiful while doing it.”

Lucas started blushing after that and Eliott couldn’t help but feel proud of how much he affected him with a single compliment.

“Oh, did I now?” Lucas responded after he pulled himself together a little.

Eliott smiled at that, even though Lucas was blushing like an idiot he still managed to be his sassy self. “So beautiful I wanted to draw you.”

Lucas perked up and looked at him surprised “Why didn’t you?”

“Didn’t want to wake you up” he answered and gave Lucas a small peck on the lips. “You can do it now if you want, you owe me a drawing anyway.” Eliott remembered. Of course, he did, he remembered everything with Lucas. “Should I draw you as an animal then or what?”

He said with a fond on his face. Lucas started giggling at that and oh god it was like an angel singing to Eliott. He would never get tired of this sound.

“I have something in mind” Lucas responded still smiling but trying to look flirty. ”Go get your stuff!” he added excitedly. Eliott didn’t have to be told twice. He got up and went to get his sketch book and some pens on his desk. When he came back, he saw Lucas lying on the bed shirtless, and his mouth fell open. He didn’t think he’s ever seen anyone more beautiful than the boy in front of him.

“Draw me like one of your French girls” Lucas said but not without letting out a giggle. Eliott shook is hand with a smile on his face. He couldn’t believe this boy. But even more he couldn’t believe that he’d chosen him to share his time with. And his kisses. They were very important too.

He wonders where he got the courage from.

But now thinking about it. Lucas was like a magnet. Trying to pull him close with such a force. He tried to resist it first, but when he looked into Lucas’ eyes yesterday. There was something. The way he looked at him like he really knew him. At that moment Eliott knew it was hopeless to resist any longer. He had already fallen hard for this boy.

Eliott’s thoughts were interrupted by Lucas slowly moving away. He looked down and saw those beautiful blue eyes, he had just been thinking about, looking right at him. “Bonjour” Lucas said with a sleepy voice that was more than enough to make Eliott pull him back into him. Lucas started giggling at that but moved his arm around him to hold the older boy.

“Do you want to get breakfast?” Eliott asked. Lucas answered with a simple “No.”

“Okay.” They were lying there in comfortable silence for a while until Lucas moved his chin up not being able to resist any longer and kissed him. Eliott melted into the kiss. Never could he get enough of kissing Lucas, kissing his soft lips. Felling his small body against his own. Lucas’ hands in his hair. It was magic. And now what he was dreaming about since he first bumped into him was actually happening. He couldn’t believe his luck.

Lucas pulled away slowly and asked him with a soft voice “Did you sleep well?” “Better than ever” Eliott replied “But I have to say it was a little chelou having someone drooling on my chest” he added teasingly. Lucas hit him his arm playfully “Heyyyy I did not do that.” But he was smiling.

“Yes, you did. But it doesn’t matter because you looked beautiful while doing it.”

Lucas started blushing after that and Eliott couldn’t help but feel proud of how much he affected him with a single compliment.

“Oh, did I now?” Lucas responded after he pulled himself together a little.

Eliott smiled at that, even though Lucas was blushing like an idiot he still managed to be his sassy self. “So beautiful I wanted to draw you.”

Lucas perked up and looked at him surprised “Why didn’t you?”

“Didn’t want to wake you up” he answered and gave Lucas a small peck on the lips. “You can do it now if you want, you owe me a drawing anyway.” Eliott remembered. Of course, he did, he remembered everything with Lucas. “Should I draw you as an animal then or what?”

He said with a fond on his face. Lucas started giggling at that and oh god it was like an angel singing to Eliott. He would never get tired of this sound.

“I have something in mind” Lucas responded still smiling but trying to look flirty. ”Go get your stuff!” he added excitedly. Eliott didn’t have to be told twice. He got up and went to get his sketch book and some pens on his desk. When he came back, he saw Lucas lying on the bed shirtless, and his mouth fell open. He didn’t think he’s ever seen anyone more beautiful than the boy in front of him.

“Draw me like one of your French girls” Lucas said but not without letting out a giggle. Eliott shook is hand with a smile on his face. He couldn’t believe this boy. But even more he couldn’t believe that he’d chosen him to share his time with. And his kisses. They were very important too.

trail.content_raw:
of course i can it’s not exactly what you asked for i just went witj the flow hope you like it anyway! this is my first fic i‘m publishing here so i‘m kinda nervous haha enjoy

—-

He looked so beautiful like this, just so peaceful like he didn’t have any worries. Eliott almost gave into the instinct to get up and draw him. But then he would have to move away from him. And that he just physically couldn’t do.

He let out a sigh and moved his eyes over Lucas’ face again. To his slightly parted lips. They made Eliott think of last night. These lips touched his own. The memories came back and he started smiling like an idiot. He still couldn’t believe Lucas, the most wonderful boy he’s ever known, left Chloé without a thought and actually let Eliott kiss him. tags: im gonna delete this mark my damn words
summary: The first time Eliott sees Lucas it was on his first day at the new school. He bumped against him and didn’t even flinched, just...
body:
The first time Eliott sees Lucas it was on his first day at the new school. He bumped against him and didn’t even flinched, just continued excitedly chatting with his friends. Eliott really wanted to know what they were talking about. After that he occasionally saw Lucas in school, on the hallways or when changing classrooms, nothing worth mentioning though.

The second time Eliott sees him, he wasn’t expecting it at all. When he heard a group of second year’s were going to fix the common room he got excited, it was a good opportunity to make new friends. But when he saw, sitting on one of the front chairs, the boy he got curious about, he was surprised. Then he noticed Lucas looking at him and he smiled. They saw each other again a few hours later at the bus stop. Smoked, talked, weird, weird, weird. He liked Lucas. He thinks Lucas also liked him. Chloè came, they didn’t talk anymore.

The third time it’s a week later, again at the bus stop. This time Eliott invites him to his house. Lucas asks him what animal Eliott would draw him as. Eliott lies, “I don’t know”, he says. He does, he has been drawing him since he saw him for the first time, but of course he doesn’t say it, it’d be weird. They spend all afternoon chatting. Eliott is happy, he puts some dubstep and dances away. He feels free. But as always, Lucas is full of surprises. He plays the piano, a soft melody echoing in Eliott’s room. “It’s him”, Eliott thinks. “You’re surprising” he then says. Eliott just can’t quite figure him out. But he wants to. He really does.

summary: my theory is that lucas will take the first half of the advice more seriously, which will lead him to try and hook up with...
body:
my theory is that lucas will take the first half of the advice more seriously, which will lead him to try and hook up with chloe. he may make a little comment the way isak did, but I don’t think he will say something explicitly homophobic. I think this clip right after the alexia clip was to show the 2 possible responses lucas can have to his sexuality, and hopefully he will take alexias advice more seriously than a random person on an internet forum. I really think the comment was just shown to show the reality of internalized homophobia.

in regards to the comment possibly being posted by Arthur, I doubt it, although his ig name means “my neighbor turturo” it’s probably just a semi common nickname used for Arthur (french people confirm or deny s’il vous plaît.

summary: Lucas feels like the loneliest Isak so far and it just breaks my heart how he practically has no one that he feels entirely...
body:
Lucas feels like the loneliest Isak so far and it just breaks my heart how he practically has no one that he feels entirely comfortable around right now (he isn’t that close to the girl squad yet, nor to the boy squad).

Martino and Isak were really close to the boy squads and Martino had Filippo. It doesn’t seem that Lucas has that kind of close relationship with anyone right now and I hope it will change. After today I’m rooting for a closer friendship between him and Alexia, it could be interesting to have a character from the LGBTQ+ community that isn’t Mika react to the homophobic behavior that Lucas is probably going to force upon himself and to his situation in general.

Ugh, I just want Lucas to get a giant hug from the girl squad and the boy squad.

Btw, right now Lucas’ situation really makes me think back to the part from ‘Love, Simon’ when Simon’s mom tells him that he can exhale now. It feels like the perfect line for someone to tell Lucas towards the end of the season.
